NINJA TELESIS - END USER AGREEMENT

 Ninja legal team strike!!

 The Ninja Telesis network (hereinafter “Ninja Tel”) is wholly owned and operated by Shady Holdings, LLC, a Nevada corporation.


In order to be able to provide each other with entertainment services, including but not limited to the provision and use of cellular network services, You and Ninja Tel (collectively, “The Parties”) hereby enter into this End User Agreement (the Agreement).

 Ninja Tel’s Obligations
 Ninja Tel shall provide you with 1 (one) SIM card and 1 (one) Ninja Tel cell phone. Ninja Tel shall use reasonable efforts to ensure that such phone and SIM card are interoperable with the Ninja Tel network. The Ninja Tel network and any services will be free to use, unless otherwise specified.


Your Obligations
 In exchange for the above-mentioned phone and SIM card, and other valuable consideration, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, you agree that your use of Ninja Tel is subject to the terms of service in this Agreement.


Acceptance
 You accept this Agreement when You: 1) accept the Ninja Tel SIM and/or Ninja Tel phone from any Ninja representative; 2) use or attempt to use the Ninja Tel network; 3) use or attempt to use any Ninja Tel services (including, but not limited to, the Ninja Tel vending machine, the Ninja Tel payphone, BoozePhone, and the NinjaPager service). If you do not wish to abide by any of the terms of this Agreement, you must immediately cease and desist all use of the Ninja Tel network. Please note that your use or non-use of the Ninja Tel network has no relation to or impact on your ability to attend or participate in any other events such as the “Ninja Party”.


NO 911

NINJA TEL DOES NOT PROVIDE 911, E911, 999, OR ANY OTHER EMERGENCY SERVICES. IN THE EVENT OF AN EMERGENCY, DIAL 911 FROM A PHONE NOT CONNECTED TO THE NINJA TEL NETWORK.


Recording and Privacy
 You hereby grant Ninja Tel permission to listen to, read, view, and/or record any and all communications sent via the network to which you are a party. Before you get all upset about this, you already know full well that AT&T does this for the NSA. You understand that you have no reasonable expectation of privacy as to any on the Ninja Tel network. You grant Ninja Tel a worldwide, perpetual, assignable, royalty-free license to the use of any and all recorded or real-time communications sent via the Ninja Tel network to you which you are a party. Don’t worry, most of this is for lulz.


Network Security 

Ninja Tel makes no claims that the Ninja Tel network is in any way secure. In fact, it is probably not secure. Don’t use it to transmit anything that requires a secure connection. Duh. 


Requests by Government

You understand that at any point during your use of the Ninja Tel network, government agencies may request Ninja Tel provide either real-time interception capabilities to any and all communications to which you are a party, or recordings of previous communications to which you were a party. You understand that, depending on the nature of the request, Ninja Tel may be legally unable to inform you about this occurrence. If this annoys you, donate money to the EFF. 


Service Suspension, Termination, and Interruption

Ninja Tel makes no guarantees, express or implied, regarding quality of service, coverage, bandwidth, or uptime. Ninja Tel reserves the right to suspend or terminate any Ninja Tel service at any time for any reason. 


Restrictions on Network Use

You agree not to use our network: 1) to threaten another with personal bodily injury or harm; or 2) to launch any manner of denial of service attack against the network itself, or any target connected to the network; or 3) to do anything to interfere with other users’ use and enjoyment of the network; or 4) to violate any terms of this Agreement; or 5) to perform any act which might be fairly described as “douchey”. You agree not to intentionally or recklessly disable, disrupt, destroy, or damage any part of the Ninja Tel network infrastructure. 


Protecting Our Network

We’re at a hacker conference, so we expect someone will attack our network, and/or violate the terms of service in the Agreement. It might be you! Ninja Tel reserves the right to protect our network by banning any phone or SIM from the network which Ninja Tel reasonably believes may be involved in any attack on the network, or that in any way violated this Agreement. Ninja Tel may also take any action reasonably designed to protect our network, our rights and interests, or the rights of others. 


Your Phone Number / Identifier

You understand that you have no property rights, intellectual property rights, or ownership interest of any kind in your phone number or any identifier(s) provided by the Ninja Tel network. Ninja Tel reserves the right to change your phone number at any time, without notice. You understand and agree that any Ninja Tel phone number and identifier(s) are publicly available information. Get ready for some boilerplate... 


DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES UNLESS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN WRITING OTHERWISE, WE MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING (TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY LAW) ANY IMPLIED WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, NON-INFRINGEMENT, OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. WE DO NOT AUTHORIZE ANYONE TO MAKE WARRANTIES ON OUR BEHALF.


No Warranty on Phone Ninja Tel did not manufacture the phone which we provided you, and thus Ninja Tel is not responsible for any defects, acts, or omissions by the manufacturer. NINJA TEL EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE PHONE OR ITS FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE ONLY WARRANTY FOR THE PHONE IS THAT WHICH IS PROVIDED BY THE MANUFACTURER. 


LIMITED LIABILITY - NO CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES
 TO THE EXTENT ALLOWED BY LAW, OUR LIABILITY FOR MONETARY DAMAGES FOR ANY CLAIMS THAT YOU MAY HAVE AGAINST US IS LIMITED TO NO MORE THAN THE REASONABLE VALUE AMOUNT OF THE SERVICES PROVIDED DURING THE AFFECTED PERIOD. YOU AGREE THAT UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL NINJA TEL BE LIABLE FOR ANY INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE, MULTIPLE, OR SPECIAL DAMAGES OF ANY NATURE WHATSOEVER. 


Indemnification
 You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold Ninja Tel and our subsidiaries, affiliates, parent companies harmless from any claims arising out of or relating to your actions, including, but not limited to, your use of the Ninja Tel network, any network services, and any information you submit, post, transmit, or make available via the network, failing to provide appropriate notices regarding any services, failure to safeguard your passwords or security, or other account information, or violating this Agreement or any policy referenced in this Agreement, any applicable law or regulation, or the rights of any third party. 


Governing Law
 This Agreement shall be governed solely by the laws of the state of Nevada. In any action regarding this Agreement, the Parties agree to submit to the jurisdiction of the courts sitting in Clark County, Nevada. 


Miscellaneous 

Almost done, just a little bit more... 

Any waiver of any part of this Agreement is invalid absent a Waiver Agreement signed by both Parties. A waiver of any one part of this Agreement does not constitute a waiver of any other part. If any part of this Agreement is held invalid or unenforceable, the rest of this Agreement shall continue to be in full force and effect. 

This Agreement is not made for the benefit of any third party. 

You may assign your rights and obligations under this Agreement, as long as such assignee unconditionally agrees to all the terms herein. 

This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the Parties and replaces all prior written or spoken agreements. 


Have a nice day!
